messages.subject: Tsuba Mei Help
messages.msgSnippet: I put a picture of a tsuba I just picked up in my folder Lou s Stuff.  I would appreciate it if someone could translate the mei, and offer some insight on the
messages.messageBody:
I put a picture of a tsuba I just picked up in my folder Lou's Stuff. I
would appreciate it if someone could translate the mei, and offer some insight on
the school/age. It has a soft metal roped rim. The theme is a man riding a
log in the river with a temple and mountains in the background. Click on it
twice to get the full screen size. Thanks in advance.

Lou


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
